entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Updating patch version does not cleanly remove old SDKs #34764
  • dotnet.exe should allow installing a single package with both an extension/tool and dotnet new templates #34763

Closed

  • <ServerGarbageCollection>false</ServerGarbageCollection> is not honored in Directory.build.props #22372

PullRequests

Created

  • I noticed a copy issue in another PR which may be related to the reference here that shouldn't be necessary. #34768
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #34748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34734
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx] Disable failing tests #34766
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [main] Disable failing tests #34765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Backport of 'First-run workload experience #34322' to release/8.0.1xx #34694
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable failing tests #34759
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove platform from output path #34651
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add back the current version of MSBuild that got removed by accident in the CPM PR #34687
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Ran 'dotnet format' on sdk.sln #34659
    untriaged
  • Allow ArtifactsPath telemetry to flow #34660
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-NetSDK
  • Enable interceptors feature when ConfigurationBindingGenerator is enabled #34732
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
